channel.title: Error Message - "No response from server, please try using different world."
channel.description: My RSPS is set up properly, and people keep telling me to do the same thing. Does anybody have an answer for this? I can connect to my server just fine.. But when it comes to others connecting... That error message shows for them. Can anybody help me?

item.title: Error Message - "No response from server, please try using different world."
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

Well this happened with like 2 other servers i tried also.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Message - "No response from server, please try using different world."

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Are you sure you used the correct client when you jarred it? Sounds like the client isn’t compatible with the server.

item.title: Error Message - "No response from server, please try using different world."
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:433000”][quote author=doritos own link=topic=535719.msg3916670#msg3916670 date=1329266526]
My RSPS is set up properly, and people keep telling me to do the same thing.
Does anybody have an answer for this?
I can connect to my server just fine…
But when it comes to others connecting…
That error message shows for them.
Can anybody help me?

[/quote]Need more information. Like what have you tried to do?[/quote] I portforwarded, Enabled my no-ip, set port exceptions, checked the clients ip (server = my no-ip), and thats about it.
Its only when other players try to connect, i can connect to the server just fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Error Message - "No response from server, please try using different world."
